name: Astronaut Alarm Clock
description: Wake up to the thrill of spaceflight with this interactive alarm clock. Project realistic constellations onto your ceiling and hear authentic NASA mission audio.

name: Self-Watering Bonsai Kit
description: Cultivate miniature zen gardens with ease! This kit includes a self-watering pot, soil, seeds, and a miniaturized landscape to create a thriving bonsai masterpiece.

name: Pocket-Sized Projector
description: Transform any surface into a movie screen! This portable projector fits in your pocket and projects crisp images from your phone or tablet.

name: Emotion-Detecting Mood Lamp
description: This lamp adjusts its color and brightness based on your mood, creating a calming or energizing atmosphere. It even syncs with your music for a truly immersive experience.

name: Talking Translator Earbuds
description: Break down language barriers in real-time! These earbuds translate spoken words into your preferred language, making travel and communication effortless.
